snippet: The Los Angeles Dodgers agreed to a $1.5 million, one-year contact with the left-hander Paul Maholm, who was 10-11 for the Braves last season.
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers agree to a one-year, $1.5 million contact with the left-hander Paul Maholm.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Dodgers agreed to a $1.5 million, one-year contact with the left-hander Paul Maholm, who was 10-11 for the Braves last season.
